meanings.definition: Having the most intense or highest level of flavor, especially in reference to meat.
meanings.sent1: The steak was the gamiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The chef recommended the gamiest cut of meat for the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The gamiest burger in town was so flavorful that it made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The gamiest stew in the world was like a flavor explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The gamiest chili I ever tasted left a lasting impression on my palate.

meanings.definition: Having the most intense or highest level of odor, especially in reference to game animals.
meanings.sent1: The hunter could smell the gamiest scent of the wild boar.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the gamiest smells of the hunting season.
meanings.sent3: The gamiest aroma from the game animals lingered in the air, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The gamiest stench from the game animals was overpowering in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The gamiest odor from the game animals was unmistakable and pungent.

meanings.definition: Showing the most intense or highest level of competitiveness or aggressiveness.
meanings.sent1: The team played their gamiest match of the season, determined to win.
meanings.sent2: The coach praised the players for their gamiest performance on the field.
meanings.sent3: The gamiest players on the team never backed down from a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The gamiest competition brought out the best in all the athletes.
meanings.sent5: The gamiest spirit of competitiveness fueled the team to victory.
